sentences.sentence: I realized that without living with the dormers, I would have never known them so well.
sentences.translation: 让我意识到若不是跟舍友们住一起，我永远都不会对他们这么了解。

sentences.sentence: By contrast, in case of dormers, constant help from roommates and teachers on duty would pull them out of possible danger in time.
sentences.translation: 相比之下，住校的学生，可以相互帮助，执勤老师也会及时地帮学生摆脱危险。
